Content: Branches or soldier types are a matrix over medium (space,
athmosphere, ground, hydrosphere surface, hydrosphere, hydrosphere
ground, underground)and vehicle size ( infantry, small vehicle, large
vehicle, base). A third dimension might be active vs supportive roles
(soldier, support(medic, mechanic ...), field officer, staff officer).
Staff officers might however be responsible for an entire medium
as the mediums may roughly correspond to branches.
